content: at a dinner the other evening i thought to myself i should be able to create something to identify everyone s stemware glass and this is what i came up with the pattern is written out on its own tibbispace page 2 there is also a single sided 1 version available for printing <hr> an alternative way to start the coaster if you aren t comfortable with the magic loop is to ch3 and then do 6 single_crochet in the first chain <hr> using different colors for each coaster allows people to recognize which glass is theirs thus the id part of the coaster using different combinations of colors between the base and chains gives you a greater variety of coasters for people to pick from 1 http //sites google com/site/tibbispace/home/pattern-cabinet/idwineglasscoaster_flat pdf 2 http //tibbispace blogspot com/2008/11/my-second-pattern html
